backend/main.mo: Implements multiplayer room management for a Snake game including room creation, activity tracking, timer toggling, and periodic game loop handling.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mappings connecting requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all frontend source files related to the match‑3 and Snake game UI.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind theme variable overrides for light and dark modes and applies base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, icons, manifest, and loading the main React script.
frontend/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to package and publish the Snake PWA as an Android app using TWA and Bubblewrap.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Defines Android TWA asset links allowing the associated app to handle all URLs.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying icons, colors, metadata, and display settings for the Snake game.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, fetch interception, and cache versioning for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the Snake screen and registers the PWA service worker.
frontend/src/game/animations.ts: Provides animation timing constants and a wait helper for delays.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Maps static asset paths and includes a helper to compute candy sprite positions.
frontend/src/game/audio/audioManager.ts: Implements a simple audio manager to load, play, and mute game sound effects.
frontend/src/game/audio/sfx.ts: Utility wrappers to trigger specific sound effects through the audio manager.
frontend/src/game/boardGeneration.ts: Generates initial boards without matches, creates candies, checks matches, and refills empty cells.
frontend/src/game/boardReshuffle.ts: Reshuffles the board until legal moves exist or attempts are exhausted.
frontend/src/game/CandyTile.tsx: Renders a single candy tile with special variant sprite handling and interaction events.
frontend/src/game/GameBoard.tsx: Renders the full game grid, handling tile interactions, highlighting, clearing, falling, and touch swipe logic.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game UI component rendering HUD, board, controls, and overlays using game state from useMatch3Game.
frontend/src/game/gravity.ts: Applies gravity to the board, moving candies downward and reporting fall events.
frontend/src/game/interaction.ts: Provides adjacency checks, position validation, and directional movement helpers.
frontend/src/game/legalMoves.ts: Determines whether any swap on the board would result in a valid match.
frontend/src/game/matchDetection.ts: Finds horizontal and vertical matches and checks whether a swap would create one.
frontend/src/game/Overlays.tsx: Defines Game Over and Level Complete overlay components with icons and action buttons.
frontend/src/game/progression.ts: Defines level configuration logic including target score and moves, plus level completion checks.
frontend/src/game/resolutionPipeline.ts: Resolves matches, applies special candy creation, handles activations, scoring, and returns updated board state.
frontend/src/game/scoring.ts: Calculates scoring for matches and defines target score and move formulas per level.
frontend/src/game/specialActivations.ts: Computes target cells for special candies and detects certain special candy combos.
frontend/src/snake/Joystick.tsx: Implements a touch joystick with pointer tracking, clamping, and filtered angle output for controlling the snake.
frontend/src/snake/joystickSteeringFilte: Implements a joystick steering filter with deadzone, hysteresis, and smoothing for stable angle input.
frontend/src/snake/logic.ts: Core Snake game logic including world constants, math helpers, pickup generation, and initial game state creation.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/Multiplay: Renders connection status UI for multiplayer joins, retries, and failures.
Small UI indicator showing reconnecting or disconnected multiplayer states.
Displays a leaderboard panel showing top-scoring snakes with the local player highlighted.
UI panel showing the current room code with clipboard copy support and error feedback.
Canvas renderer for multiplayer mode drawing snakes, pickups, and world terrain with wraparound and camera logic.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/types.ts: Type definitions for multiplayer snakes, game state, and room info.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/urlRoomCo: Helper functions to read, write, and clear room codes in the URL for invite links.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/useInputS: Periodically submits the player's current angle to the backend while in a multiplayer room.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/useMultip: Manages creating, joining, leaving, and tracking status/errors for multiplayer rooms.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/useNickna: Stores, validates, and persists the player's nickname with length checks.
frontend/src/snake/multiplayer/useRoomPo: Polls the backend for multiplayer room state and tracks connection status and failures.
frontend/src/snake/pickupSprites.ts: Defines sprite rectangles and helpers for selecting and sizing pickup visuals.
frontend/src/snake/RotateToLandscapeOver: Shows a fullscreen prompt instructing users to rotate their device to landscape mode.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeBoosters.tsx: Renders three disabled booster buttons with icons and counts using game asset sprites.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeCanvas.tsx: Draws the game world, player, AI, food, and environment to a canvas with DPR scaling, wrapping, and camera logic.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeHUD.tsx: Displays leaderboard and mission progress panels using game state values and asset images.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMainMenu.tsx: Provides the main menu UI with nickname handling, room creation/joining, and game mode selection.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMinimap.tsx: Draws a small minimap showing world boundaries, snake positions, and the viewport box.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeMissionCompleteO: Shows a simple mission-complete overlay with celebratory text.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeOverlays.tsx: Contains pause and game-over overlays with actions and basic game stats.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeScreen.tsx: Main Snake game screen handling single-player and multiplayer modes, UI overlays, and rendering state setup.
frontend/src/snake/types.ts: Defines core game types including snakes, pickups, game state, and mission state.
frontend/src/snake/useCanvasViewport.ts: Computes responsive canvas viewport dimensions with DPR support and resize stabilization.
frontend/src/snake/useLandscapeOrientati: Tracks whether the device is currently in landscape orientation.
frontend/src/snake/useSnakeGame.ts: Runs the main game loop, handles mission timing, controls, and snake movement logic.
frontend/src/snake/wzAssets.ts: Provides centralized paths to Worms Zone–style asset images.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, containers, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Holds current project state describing needed multiplayer room code join flow and removal of a right‑side coin image. Lists existing features, pending requests, and known UI issues.
